name: Selim Aksoy
content: Selim Aksoy's Home Page Selim Aksoy Contact Information Professor and Chair Department of Computer Engineering Bilkent University Bilkent, 06800, Ankara, Turkey Office: Engineering Building, EA 418 (Engineering Building in Google Maps) Phone: +90 (312) 290-1218 (Department Secretary) +90 (312) 290-3405 Fax: +90 (312) 266-4047 Email: URI: http://www.cs.bilkent.edu.tr/~saksoy I am a Professor at the Department of Computer Engineering at Bilkent University. I am also serving as the Department Chair. I received my Ph.D. degree from the University of Washington in Seattle in 2001. Before joining Bilkent, I worked as a Research Assistant at the Intelligent Systems Laboratory at UW during 1996-2001, and as a Research Scientist at Insightful Corporation in Seattle during 2001-2003. I spent 2013 as a Visiting Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington. My current research interests include computer vision, statistical and structural pattern recognition, machine learning and data mining with applications to object recognition, image and video classification, remote sensing image analysis and medical imaging. Home Research Teaching Students Publications Professional Personal CV Schedule Please send questions/suggestions to . URI for this page is http://www.cs.bilkent.edu.tr/~saksoy/index.html. Last updated on January 31, 2022.
